channel.title: Enterprenuership on Tristan's website
channel.description: Recent content in Enterprenuership on Tristan's website

item.title: Why statisticians should join and launch startups
item.description: The tough economic times we live in, and the potential for big paydays, have made entrepreneurship cool. From the venture capitalist-in-chief, to the javascript coding mayor of New York, everyone is on board. No surprise there, successful startups lead to job creation which can have a major positive impact on the economy. The game has been dominated for a long time by the folks over in CS. But the value of many recent startups is either based on, or can be magnified by, good data analysis.
